nl.han.ica.OOPDProcessingEngineHAN.Engine

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • java.applet.Applet
            • processing.core.PApplet
              • nl.han.ica.OOPDProcessingEngineHAN.Engine.GameEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, processing.core.PConstants

    public abstract class GameEngine
extends processing.core.PApplet
    GameEngine is the core of the game. Extending this class is required to make use of the GameEngine. This engine is created by: Bram Heijmink, Jeffrey Haen, Joost Elshof, Kenny Ligthart, Mark Vaesen & Nico Smolders.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • updateGame

        public void updateGame()
        Updates every GameObject inside the GameEngine. Calls move method and checks for collision. This method is called by the GameThread.

      • calculateRelativeMouseLocation

        public processing.core.PVector calculateRelativeMouseLocation(int x,
                                                              int y)
